oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Our Little Monitor" Union patriotic token
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The token has an image of the USS Monitor, the famous ironclad that fought the CSS Virginia at Hampton Roads on March 9, 1862, on one side and the year 1863 on the other side. The Monitor sank on Dec. 31, 1862 which may have occasioned this commemorative piece.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
